properties.entry: -- 通话记录列表 SELECT tc.content AS content, tc.id AS id, tc.isEnabled AS isEnabled, tc.sortNo AS sortNo, tc.type AS type, tc.typeText AS typeText, tc.creator AS creator, tc.creatorId AS creatorId, tc.createTime AS createTime FROM tel_callreason AS tc WHERE tc.isEnabled = 1 {?AND tc.type = #type#} {?AND tc.content like concat(concat('%',#content#),'%') escape '/' } ORDER BY tc.sortNo
